text: However, the mum - of - three is not having it disabling all comments on the post and revealing the real story. ` ` I'm seeing online and on news media outlets that I suffered a'Photoshop fail,'''she wrote on her website. ` ` So ridiculous! I reposted a picture on Instagram that a fan had already posted â€” I only added a filter to it. It looks like the fan mirrored the photo, which is the reason the car looks like that. So, this is actually really funny to me!'' And it looks like Kim has put this controversy behind her.
